basics.name: Arthur L
basics.label: Full Stack Developer | Web3 Specialist
basics.summary: Experienced full stack developer specializing in Web3, blockchain technologies, and modern web development. Proven track record of architecting and delivering sophisticated applications across DeFi, NFTs, and blockchain infrastructure with expertise in Cosmos, Solana, and EVM ecosystems.

work.name: Polarity / Hyperhyper
highlights: Developing front-end components for an options trading platform on Hyperliquid blockchain
Created MVP webapp that contributed to successful fundraising
Working within a team of 3 developers to enhance user experience and protocol functionality
work.summary: Front-end development for a decentralized options trading protocol, initially on Berachain and later rebranded to Hyperhyper on Hyperliquid blockchain.
work.technologies: Next.js, React, TypeScript, ShadCN, Tailwind, EVM Blockchains, Viem/Wagmi

work.name: Daylight
highlights: Developing modules for the 'Cataloger' service within a 3-person team
Implementing collectors for crypto applications to transform on-chain and API data into user recommendations
Collaborating with Brooklyn-based team through regular English communication
work.summary: Part-time contractor at Daylight (daylight.xyz), a Web3 startup specializing in user recommendations and data analysis.
work.technologies: TypeScript, Node.js, Mocha/Sinon, PostgreSQL, Prisma, EVM Blockchains

work.name: Imperator
highlights: Developed Solana domain name service connecting Injective blockchain with SNS domains via Wormhole bridge
Built token airdrop site for XION blockchain launch with authentication and token transfer security
Created interfaces for Authz management (permission delegation) on Injective blockchain
work.summary: Front-end development for multiple Cosmos ecosystem projects through Imperator, a major validator connecting developers with Cosmos projects.
work.technologies: Next.js, React, Nuxt, Vue, TypeScript, Tailwind, tRPC, Prisma, PostgreSQL, Vitest, Cosmos SDK

work.name: Availabs
highlights: Architected and developed complete backend for an AI/LLM-based meal planning application
Led team of 4 developers using agile methodologies and task management tools
Designed and developed Web3 investment management application with portfolio tracking and fiat/crypto conversion
work.summary: Full-time backend leadership role at a Paris-based startup, architecting solutions for AI and Web3 applications.
work.technologies: TypeScript, Node.js, Express, NestJS, Vitest, PostgreSQL, Prisma, Stripe

work.name: Alcatel-Lucent Enterprise
highlights: Designed and developed APIs for internal flex-office desk reservation service
Contributed to REST APIs for KPIs related to license sales
Enhanced real-time hybrid telephony event management system for improved scalability
work.summary: Back-end developer for Rainbow APIs (https://openrainbow.com/), Alcatel's flagship product similar to Microsoft Teams but designed for the European market with self-hosting capabilities.

awards.title: Base Blockchain Prize - SuperHack 2024
awards.summary: Won as a solo developer against teams for building 'Fairpay', a gasless crowdfunding platform based on Base and Farcaster.

languages.fluency: Professional working proficiency with strong communication skills

projects.name: Fairpay
projects.description: A gasless crowdfunding platform built on Base and integrated with Farcaster. Developed as a solo project during the SuperHack 2024 online hackathon.
highlights: Won Base blockchain prize at ETHGlobal's SuperHack 2024
Full stack implementation with gasless transactions for improved user experience
Integration with Farcaster for social functionality
projects.technologies: Next.js, TypeScript, ShadCN, Tailwind, OnchainKit, Viem, Base Blockchain, Farcaster

projects.name: Ampy
projects.description: Platform connecting musical artists with fans by exchanging album purchases/pre-orders/Spotify streams for chances to win prizes and benefits, using blockchain and NFTs to store users' 'fan cards' for specific artists.
highlights: Collaborated with Sony Music (France), and the world class artist Jain for her album 'The Fool'
Led team of 5 developers, implementing agile methodologies and task management
Served as back-end development lead responsible for architecture decisions and technology selection
Mentored junior developers and provided technical guidance
Set up CI/CD pipelines for continuous deployment
projects.technologies: NestJS, TypeORM, PostgreSQL, AWS (Cognito, S3, SES), NFTs
